timeline.bodyHTML:
is***() methods should never return null. Instead change this to one of the following:

public Boolean getUseInAppDefault() {
  return this.useInAppDefault;
}

public boolean isUseInAppDefault() {
  return Boolean.TRUE.equals(this.useInAppDefault);
}
timeline.author: hiranya911
hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Should the getter take a boolean?
replies.author: lahirumaramba

timeline.body: Is this used anywhere? If not lets remove it. And also change the setter to accept `boolean` so it matches the getter.
